text: It's that time again that we ensure that you've understood the principles we've been through throughout part five. So firstly, define and interpret initiative versus responsive price behaviour. Take your time here, remember those examples I showed you when talking about initiative aggressive versus sort of more passive responsive type price behaviour. List the various day types for both trend and non-trend days. Take your time here, spend a lot of time not just listing them, but understanding the various characteristics and shapes of each one of those day types. And lastly, what is the initial balance? And at which time does this occur in the markets you trade? Good luck!
